roleset.name: diminish in rank
roleset.note: DEMOTE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'demote' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from demote.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: no agent
example.text: The Volokhs were afraid that they'd end up like a friend of theirs who [*T*-1]-2'd applied for a visa and waited for 10 years, [*-2]-3 having been demoted [*-3] from his profession of theoretical mathematician to shipping clerk.
example.arg: from his profession of theoretical mathematician
